choices: Gregor Samsa, a traveling salesman from the early 1900s.
Mr. Samsa, father of Gregor and Grete.
Mrs. Samsa, mother of the twosome.
1.content: Choose a member of the Samsa family. Once the metamorphosis starts, their lives are forever changed and the process into a "ungeheures ungeziefer" (aka a monstrous vermin) can not be reverted.
1.title: Dawn of The Curse

11.content: Gregot Samsa, a traveling salesman that desires to become one man with the wealth and fame. However, his dreams are about to be shattered when the following morning, he becomes something overnight. But what could it be?
11.title: Gregor Samsa, a traveling salesman from the ear...

choices: Gretyl Samsa, part-time animator and husband of Grete.
Kate Wurf, photographer of TIME magazines.
Matthew Pride, a soldier fighting for peace and freedom in the Irish Civil War.
Karl Matt Jr, a soon-to-be filmmaker who want to earn a profit.
15.content:
It's the 1920s, the Samsas are now residing in a small apartment as the Samsas are trying to get over the passing of their former son, Gregor Samsa.
Mr. and Mrs. Samsa are struggling to save up their finance problems, while Grete grown into a gorgeous and pretty lady. Recently, she had been married to Gretyl Samsa, an animator in the new animation business, who had three friends:
Kate Wurf, photographer of the new TIME magazines from New York City.
Matthew Pride, a unit of the Irish Republican Army that currently fighting in the Irish Civil War.
And Karl Matt Jr, a coming-of-age filmmaker looking for the "perfect leading beauty queen for my new smash hit", "Attack of the Martian Androids: Part Deux".

The four are trying to get along, but due to their own problems, they refuse to do so, like Grete neglecting to become the lead female role in Karl's new film and Matthew's fear of controversy and bashing if the news broke out about the Civil War.

But then one night, something begins to happens to one of them...
15.title: Samas without a Samsa

info.brief_description: Based on the novella by Franz Kafka, but with new twists and turns.
info.description: The story is about a man named Gregor Samsa who been turned into an insect of sorts, but what if he becamed a different species that dominaced the planet? Or does the metamorphosis has been passed down into decentdants of the Samsa family tree? The odds are in your favors.
